prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon that resembles a mechanical creature with electricity flowing through it.
Generate a Pokemon with a futuristic design, featuring magnets and a sleek metallic body.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon that blends technology and nature in its appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon that has three rotating parts and emits sparks of electricity.
Design a Pokemon with a shiny blue exterior, capturing the essence of magnetism.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it could generate powerful electromagnetic fields.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies both science and electricity in its vibrant design.
